name: AI tintype photography a history of robots

metadata.name: TINTYPE ROBOT #001
metadata.description:
AI tintype photography (a history of robots)
.
.
.
by the age of 8, i was reading speculative fiction (my inner world) and accompanying my father on antiquing expeditions (my outer world).

this collection is a merger of those parts of my own history, science-fiction/fantasy/imagination (robots) and antique collecting (tintype photography).

and perhaps also, a reflection on what could happen if an AI decided to use images to assist in the rewriting of history to suit its own agenda.  after all, seeing is believing, right ? if it’s on the internet it must be true, yes ? 

the truth is out there (in there?) … somewhere …

digital art by e9Art using google colab notebooks and photoshop, June 2022
